posts.postText:
[CSN] PuRpLeHaZe
STEAM_0:1:22689778

On TTT on October, 24th, 2010, [CSN] PuRpLeHaZe came on to the [NNJG] Server and started to rdm, I got to videos on fraps showing someone of the people killed by him, and the struggle when he was rdming. In total he probably rdmed over 10 people. No admins on. I was the only one with the NNJG tag on and I tried to get Pharaoh on who might have been playing PERP, and Gash who was playing MW2.

Witnesses: 
dx5231 
cartmin45
Mr. Bigglesworth
Moloc
Dr. Garbonzo 
I_SEE_YOU2™

Rasey

[NBLCKK] Ctrl Alt Defeat NBLCKK

But here is the link to the videos. In this video the two people he killed may be hard to see but they are visible.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6FNug3jpPqg




Thanks for taking the time to look at this ban request. Trust me that all the witnesses do not want this guy to come back on our TTT server.
I wish there were ratings. He came on today when I was on and rdmed me. He was immediately banned for blatant rdm.
